Sickest speedrun game I've ever played, no cap. My face when suitman looks at me and I go "bruh" and he walks away, epic. Got it in that one ValvE Super Sale where all the games were like $11 bucks, and HL1 is definitely worth that price, so it's nice I got everything else too. Now Gordonman can bhop from one game into the next with relative ease. If you're gonna be playing with friends, get Sven Coop instead. If you're lookin to be the doomslayer of scientists, you've got your game. 11/5

XD

Тяжело оценивать игры 98 года в 2020, но я будучи избалованный играми чел, всё же могу представить те времена .Тогда fps шутеров было не так много doom, да quake. И можно сказать что half-life один из прародителей данного жанра, ведь именно благодаря ей появился CS. Но помимо того что это отличный шутер, он в себе сумел поместить загадки и сюжет. Погружающий нас в атмосферу научного комплекса black mesa, молчаливого Фримена, загадочного G-мена, и монстров из другого мира. Эти игра и отличается от классических шутеров того времени.Советую поиграть, ведь это классика, её знать надо.

Bu oyunu oynamayan ender kimselerden biri iseniz indirimde iken mutlaka edinin derim. Oyunu senaryo-görevli şekilde tek başına oynamanız mümkün ancak çoklu oyuncu seçeneği ile özellikle de arkadaşlarınızla çok keyifli olabilir.

''+''ları:

*Kolay oynanan, old ama gold dedikleri tarzda bi oyun. 

''-''leri:

*Oyun içi istatistik, editör gibi özellikleri de olsa daha iyi olabilir.

have you seen my coffee cup

Oooh, i get to be a contrarian! Yay!

In all seriousness, I would enjoy Half Life. I might enjoy it a lot... if not for the unintuitive level design and interaction.
I can't count the number of times I've lost my damn mind stepping onto something which looked safe, but wasn't (even though it seemed identical to another safe thing) and when I failed to reach a platform or latch onto a surface because I wasn't doing the right keyboard shuffle when I hit it.

When you get past all these little complaints... it just feels like a shooter game. Granted, it's enjoyable, but I don't see what's particularly special about it.
I'm sure it was really good for it's time, but it's probably like Star Wars or most cartoons: it's only truly enjoyable if you grew up with it, and I didn't. I heard there was a fan-based remake of this game, and I'm sure I'd love it to death. But not right now, my forehead is bruised from slamming it against the keyboard so many times.
